session_and_event_registration_failed:
您好,

Unfortunately you haven't been registered to session event "%event_name%" on %event_start_date% because there is no more available place in training session.
session_and_event_registration_pending_m:
Hello,

You have been registered to training session %session_name% and all its mandatory session events.
As there is no more available place in the chosen session event "%event_name%" on %event_start_date% you have been put in a queue. You will be informed when there is availability.
session_and_event_registration_success_m:
Hello,

You have been registered to session event "%event_name%" on %event_start_date%. This session event is part of training session "%session_name%". Therefore you have also been registered to all mandatory training sessions.
session_and_event_registration_success_p:
您好,

We have reveiced your request for registration to session event "%event_name%" on %event_start_date%.
However your registration has to be validated before.
session_event_registration_pending_msg:
您好,

课程"%event_name%" 于 %event_start_date% 开始，已没有更多的有效位置.
您已经被置于一个等待队列中，当有有效位置时，您将得到通知.
session_event_registration_pending_to_re:
您好,

课程 "%event_name%" 将于 %event_start_date% 开始.
As 已接受您的注册.
session_event_registration_request: 课程 %event_name% 注册请求将于 %event_start_date% [%status%]
session_event_registration_success_msg:
您好,

您注册的课堂 "%event_name%" 将于 %event_start_date% 开始.
session_event_set_limit_info: You can register to %limit% session event(s) of this set您可以注册限量版的课程.
session_not_enough_place_msg: 仅有 %remainingPlaces% 位置在 "%sessionName%" 的 "%courseTitle% [%courseCode%]"课堂中剩余
session_registration_object: 课堂 "%session_name%" 从 %start_date% 到 %end_date% [%status%] 注册
session_registration_pending_msg:
您好,

您注册的课程 "%session_name%",从 %start_date% 开始到 %end_date% 结束，正在等待确认.
session_registration_registered_msg:
您好,

您注册的课程 "%session_name%" 从 %start_date% 开始到 %end_date%结束，已注册成功.
session_registration_validated_msg:
Hello,

Your registration to session "%session_name%" from %start_date% to %end_date% has been validated.
session_request_confirm_msg: 您已经请求注册课程 "%sessionName%" 的 "%courseTitle% [%courseCode%]"
session_request_confirmation_success: 课程 "%sessionName%" 的 "%courseTitle%" 注册请求确认.
